Unitron/Injector/Manterror/Firestarter/Double Punch/Ares/Sixshot/Shockwave:





Out of scanner range both ways from the Maximal City, but not out of visual 
range, Unitron and Sixshot hovered in the air completely still in their biped 
forms.

"Not much going on." Sixshot stated.

"There was a battle."

"True.  Nothing much now."

"True." Unitron said, activating his comm. and sending the news to Shockwave.

---

Injector, Manterror, and Ares stood on the coast of Spain, their optic view 
intensified by a dozen times to give them a good view of the Alliance base.

"Absolutely nothing," Ares said, sending a transmission indicating that was 
so to Shockwave.

===

Shockwave sent a transmission to Rampage in a near monotone voice, "You are 
not needed, if you do not comply with simple instructions then you are not 
worthy of being within Decepticon ranks."  Two incoming transmissions alerted 
Shockwave to the mission status.

He sent a reply to Unitron.  "Next time you fail to inform me of an 
opportunity such as that at the Maximal City, you will fail to exist."

Double Punch and Firestarter sat in front of monitors, running security and 
other vital functions of the Ramora.
